data.title: Leo Penn
data.text:
AKA Leo Z. Penn

Born: 27-Aug-1921

Birthplace: Lawrence, MA

Died: 5-Sep-1998

Location of death: Malibu, CA

Cause of death: Cancer - Lung

Remains: Buried, Holy Cross Cemetery, Culver City, CA

Gender: Male

Religion: Jewish

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Film Director, Actor, Relative

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: The Dark Secret of Harvest Home

Military service: US Army

Wife: Olive Deering (div. 1952)

Wife: Eileen Ryan (actress, m. 1958)

Son: Michael Penn (musician, b. 1958)

Son: Sean Penn (actor, b. 1960)

Son: Chris Penn (actor, b. 1965, d. 2006)

Emmy Columbo, "Any Port in a Storm" (1973)

Hollywood Blacklist

Lithuanian Ancestry

Russian Ancestry

Jewish Ancestry

Risk Factors: Smoking

FILMOGRAPHY AS DIRECTOR

Judgment in Berlin (6-May-1988)

The Dark Secret of Harvest Home (23-Jan-1978)

A Man Called Adam (3-Aug-1966)

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Crossing Guard (10-Sep-1995) · Hank

The Wild Life (28-Sep-1984)

Sixth and Main (1977)

The Story on Page One (Dec-1959)

Not Wanted (24-Jun-1949)

The Undercover Man (21-Mar-1949) · Sidney Gordon

Fall Guy (15-Mar-1947)
